name: Examples
description: TI's SimpleLink CC2640R2 SDK provides a comprehensive set of examples to help developers get started with the SimpleLink CC2640R2 family of wireless microcontrollers. The SimpleLink CC2640R2 SDK provides examples that cover how to use BLE, BLE5, Proprietary RF, TI-Drivers and other software included in the SDK.

name: Documents
description: The SimpleLink CC2640R2 SDK comes with documentation for all of the supported software libraries included in the SDK. For a good overview of what documentation is available in the SimpleLink CC2640R2 SDK, go to "Documentation Overview". To get started quickly with the SimpleLink CC2640R2 SDK, go to "Quick Start Guide".
